title: Correct header logo asset and reference

requirements.summary: Replace the header logo artwork with the corrected static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated so the displayed logo matches the originally provided image.
acceptanceCriteria: When the app loads, the header logo visually matches the originally uploaded/provided logo.
The logo is served as a static file under frontend/public/assets/generated and is referenced by a /assets/generated/... path in the frontend.
No logo image is fetched via the backend canister; there are no backend routes/handlers for image serving.

file_operations.description: Add the corrected logo image asset (replacing the mismatched artwork) as a static file to be served directly by the frontend.

requirements.summary: Make the logo reference unambiguous by updating App.tsx to reference the corrected logo filename that exists in frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/App.tsx references a logo filename that exists in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The alt text remains in English and continues to describe the logo appropriately.
A hard refresh shows the corrected logo (not the old/mismatched one).

file_operations.description: Update the header src to reference /assets/generated/rajesh-kurkure-garhwa-logo-corrected.dim_256x256.png while keeping the existing English alt text and leaving the app name text unchanged.
